About Us
Coquina Cove is a 32-acre tropical paradise conveniently located in Palm City, Florida, just blocks from the entrance to the Florida Turnpike, 30 minutes to West Palm Beach Airport (via I-95), and minutes from fine dining and pristine beaches.
We are privately owned, and professionally managed by South Sands Management. With over 30 years of experience managing multiple properties east of the Mississippi River, the key to our success is that we aim to give our residents the best door to door experience possible in a residential rental community. Our strong core values, family atmosphere, and exceptional customer service sets us apart.
We look forward to having you as a satisfied and happy resident at this community.
Our Mission
Coquina Cove is a dynamic residential community delivering the finest experiences to our residents and team members. We efficiently operate our property with a resident- entered focus by providing a carefree lifestyle while pursuing growth professionally and personally.
Our Vision
Coquina Cove is the Treasure Coast's most sought after multigenerational apartment community offering scenic landscaping with expansive amenities, encompassing a caring, dedicated and reliable team.
Meet Your Management Team
Welcome to Coquina Cove! We’re excited to introduce our dedicated management team. Our team is here to ensure you have the best living experience possible and is committed to making Coquina Cove a wonderful place to call home.
Alan Rose
Principal
Jeff Gustafson
Principal
Ashlynn Turban
"Hi, I’m Ashlynn!
I’m the Property Manager here at Coquina Cove, and I’ve been with this wonderful community for 3 ½ years, starting from leasing and working my way up. As a travel enthusiast, I enjoy exploring new places, but you'll often find me relaxing at the beach or spending time with my fur babies.  I’m here to help make Coquina Cove a welcoming and vibrant place for all our residents. I’m excited to be a part of your journey here!"
Property Manager
Brittney Cotterell
"Hi, I’m Brittney! I
’m the Assistant Property Manager here at Coquina Cove, and I’ve been in property management for 5 years. As a true Floridian born and raised, I love helping our community shine! When I’m not at work, you can find me soaking up the sun at the beach or spending quality time with my kids. I’m excited to be a part of this vibrant community and look forward to making your experience here exceptional!"
Assistant Property Manager
Melissa Poux-Williams
"Hi, I’m Melissa!
I’m the newest member of the office team at Coquina Cove, serving as your leasing professional! With a background as a realtor, I'm excited to help you find your perfect home here. I’m also a fitness enthusiast who loves staying active! In my free time, I enjoy spending time with friends as well as enjoying some well-deserved alone time. I can’t wait to meet all of you and assist you in our wonderful community!"
Leasing Professional & Lifestyle Coordinator
Matthew Hamrick
"Hi, I'm Matt! I’m the Service Supervisor and I've been part of this wonderful community for nearly 5 years. With over 10 years of experience in maintenance, I love ensuring everything runs smoothly for our residents! When I’m not at work, you can find me enjoying quality time with my pup, Luna, and my kids, or out on my boat soaking up the sun. I’m excited to be a part of making Coquina Cove feel like home!"
Service Supervisor
Joseph Birdsell
"Hi, I'm Joe! I’m one of the service technicians here at Coquina Cove. After serving in the Air Force, I joined this fantastic community and have been a part of the team for 3 ½ years. Fun fact—I was a resident here for 2 years before taking on my current role. When I’m not out fixing things and keeping our community running smoothly, I’m a proud father, balancing work and home life. I’m excited to be here and help make Coquina Cove the best place to live!"
Service Technician
Louis Pantoja
"Hi, I’m Louis!
I’m one of the service technicians here at Coquina Cove, I was born and raised in New York before making my way to Florida, where I've spent the past 11 years! With a solid maintenance background, I love keeping our community in top shape. When I'm not at work, you’ll find me enjoying quality time with my family and kids. I’m excited to be a part of this great community!"
Service Technician
Sean Woods
"Hi, I’m Sean!
I’m excited to be back serving as your porter here at Coquina Cove!
I have a passion for classic cars, fishing, and boating, and truly love being outdoors. Family is everything to me, and I cherish my time with my children. I'm eager to jump back in and help ensure our community looks its absolute best every day.  I’m excited to be part of this wonderful community again and help make it shine!"
Porter
Coquina Cove
3641 SW Coquina Cove Way, Palm City, FL 34990, United States of America
(772) 288-2115

HEAD RT JS Include
End of HEAD RT JS Include
photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: c7c4f1bc
Share by:
